Sound Mix: Dolby Stereo, Dolby Digital, Dolby A, Surround, Dolby SR
Synopsis: This film tells the story of an upper-middle class woman who has always lived in her husband's shadow, in a villa in a residential suburb of Rome. The husband's sudden death in a car accident makes her fall into a state of deep depression, from which she begins to emerge when by chance she finds out that her husband had always led a secret life parallel to their own. She then begins to investigate, searches for her husbands' friends and discovers a world which is completely new to her.
Title: Ignorant Fairies
